pages.text: The $(item)Logistics Wand$() lets you designate containers for automated item management and define your companion's home area.

pages.title: Wand Modes
pages.text: $(li)$(bold)Shift+Scroll$() — Cycle wand mode$(li)$(bold)Shift+Right-click$() container — Tag/untag it$(br2)Modes:$(br2)$(#5599FF)INPUT$() (Blue) — Item source$(br)$(#FF8800)OUTPUT$() (Orange) — Item destination$(br)$(#55FF55)STORAGE$() (Green) — General storage$(br)$(#55FFAA)HOME AREA$() (Cyan) — Click two corners to define the companion's home zone.$(br2)Tagged containers show colored outlines and floating labels when holding the wand.
